description:
I like the software. It has worked with most of my issuers. The GUI isn't that great but who cares. 

I recommend it if you're a practical person.
summary: It works fine and it's practical

description:
This app encrypt data with master password.
Auto lock app when user inactive.
Copy OTP with single click.
This app is simple and it does what is says on the description.
Just check it out. Be sure not to make any backup.
summary: The best app to loose access to all your accounts

description: Imported encrypted keys from my andOTP app, works, double click to display and copy. It doesnt need to do more than this, and does this perfectly

summary: It does a better job then most of android apps

description:
Simple UI, flawless import of repositories such as Google Authenticator, Aegis, freeOTP.
This makes cross-platform management so easy.
